lines.text: You always wanted to be like your brother didn't you Jimi?
Dead.
VERY dead.

[after Vinnie takes out a switchblade]
Do you wanna give that to me?
Oh I'd LOVE to give it to you.

[to Chip]
Still not scared?
No, you're as cool as a corpse, right Chip?
You know I bet Vinnie here a whole nickel, that your old clunker wouldn't burn rubber Jimmy. But I was wrong, everything burns.
How much money do you got?
12 Cents.
Liar!

[to Chip]
Time to rock, jock!

[Lawson, Vincent and North have Chip trapped in their car]
Well boys, what's it gonna take to scare this guy?

[smiles]
"The face"
...North, you do it.
Nah, it's for kids.
I'll do it.
[Vincent looks away, and looks back. He shows his real face, his dead face - he laughs]
No, it ain't working man, he's not scared. Are ya Chippie, ya nuckle head!
[North noogies Chip's head then he turns dead too, so does Lawson. Vincent and North each grab one of Chip's legs and his shirt]

[Turns round and takes out a switchblade]
Time to rock, jock!

[to Jimi]
Speaking of family, how's that kid of yours?
I bet he's chicken; just like his old man.
Those Punks... said they transferred in from Milford... I checked, I can't find any Milford High.
That's because It isn't a school.
Run Jimmy Run!
